alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 10:17AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A cluster of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms will continue impact portions of east central Middlesex County through 1115 AM EDT... At 1015 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms over Lexington. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Waltham, Medford, Arlington, Billerica, Woburn, Watertown, Lexington, Belmont, Burlington, Winchester, Concord, Bedford, Lincoln and Carlisle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
